name: JAWS.io
description:
DUN dun, DUN dun…. JAWS is now causing chaos on mobile in this fun and fast-paced hyper-casual io game. Submerge yourself in the waters of Amity Island and rack up the points by avoiding being taken down by others and finishing the round with the top score!

PLAY AS JAWS
RAMPAGE mode -- Choose this mode and from the beginning to the end of the match, play as the infamous shark and devour your way to first place, while avoiding the boats who want you out of their waters. How much of the map can you eat?

KING OF THE SEAS
In this mode, battle it out for the top title as JAWS. The player with the highest score controls his menacing powers but beware, in this mode every other boat wants to be JAWS, so challenge yourself by not being knocked out of first place.

CHALLENGE YOUR FRIENDS
Compete with up to seven friends in a Local Game! By selecting this mode, you can use a unique code to open the waters to those you want to specifically compete against with a level playing field.

WHATEVER FLOATS YOUR BOAT
Don’t be a chum with the basics -- unlock new boats and shark skins with achievements! Choose a custom skin and stand out from the other fish in the sea. The more achievements you unlock, the more skin options you’ll have.

Jaws.io is regularly updated with new features, things to eat and save. This app also contains in-App Purchases which allow players to buy upgrades. This game contains advertising. Advertising is disabled by purchasing the ad-free version of the game.



Privacy Policy: https://www.nbcuniversal.com/privacy
Terms of Service: https://www.nbc.com/general/pages/terms
EULA: https://docs.universalstudiosinteractive.com/legal/generic-mobile-eula.pdf
